name: Sherwood
description: Sherwood is an indie game developed by three high schoolers (Connor Russi, Brady Malone, and Fane Uren). Sherwood is an open-world RPG where the player only has a bow and three magic abilities. You must use all of your abilities with your different arrows in order to take out camps of enemies and explore everywhere from the vast forests of Sherwood to the deep dark caves of Sherwood trying to save the world from evil.
